ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars RPG
ygData.msgSnippet: Dracona heard something and looked to see Ramhorn in the distance. I thought he must have been dead! Train Wreck said. I gotta go help him! Airbomber said.

Dracona heard something and looked to see Ramhorn in the distance.

"I thought he must have been dead!" Train Wreck said.

"I gotta go help him!" Airbomber said. Airbomber ran across the field over
to Ramhorn.

"Need some help? You look hurt." Airbomber said. Artist looked into the
distance and seen Ramhorn, one of the guys that shot at him! Artist didn't
even bother trying to realize that he remembered something from his days as
Suukie, and just flew up to Ramhorn and landed.

"Ramhorn." Artist whispered, his cold stare working. Airbomber ignored
Artist and waited for Ramhorn to reply...
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 25, 2000 6:23 AM
Subject: Neo Beast Wars RPG


> Nemesis Enforcer/Koga Shuko/Unitron/Double Punch/Manterror/Bumblebee/The
>
Oblitercons/Sixshot/Anubis/Hades/Serpentor/Injector/Smokescreen/Beachcomber/
> Ramhorn:
>
>
> Injector and Manterror got into CR chambers, ignoring Hell Beast's orders.
> It was them before others.
>
> ---
>
> Double Punch nodded at Hell Beast's commands, running outside of the
Predacon
> base.  Raising a pincher, cloaking quickly, he fired a regular missile off
up
> at Sixshot, who was in the process of strafing once more.
>
> ---
>
> Bumblebee charged out of his quarters, raising both stinger missile
> launchers.  "Hmmm...maybe I should sit this one out..." he said to
himself,
> walking instead of running to an exit to the Predacon base.
>
> ===========
>
> Nemesis Enforcer walked into the bridge of the Alliance base, waiting.
>
> ---
>
> Each Oblitercon got out of a CR chamber.
>
> Dark One looked around.  <Zardus, where is my payment of 200 kilos of
energon
> located?  I wish to collect my payments>
>
> ==========
>
> Sixshot opened fire, lasers tearing up Double Punch's incoming missile,
> causing it to explode before it hit it's intended target.  Sixshot
chuckled.
> "A cloaking device...to bad it won't do much good!" he laughed, firing two
> missiles at where he had saw the missile eminate from.
>
> ---
>
> Unitron grunted as autogun fire hit him, firing two missiles into the
crowd
> of Predacons Marine was leading.
>
> ---
>
> Double Punch yelled, two missiles sending him slamming back through the
air,
> slamming into the hull of the Predacon ship, his cloaking device down,
> himself sliding to the ground unconsciouss.
>
> ---
>
> Koga Shuko took out his missile launcher, firing an optic blast at an
> autogun, as autogunf ire bounced off his heavy armor, leaving scratches.
He
> fired off a rocket at the middle of the parade of advancing Predacons
Marine
> was leading.
>
> ---
>
> Anubis took out his missile launcher, firing a rocket off at the crowd of
> angry as hell looking Predacons.
>
> ---
>
> Hades raised his laser rifle, firing three bolts, each at a seperate
autogun.
>
> ---
>
> Serpentor raised his plasma launcher, firing a powerful plasma blast off
at a
> group of autoguns.  "Myah, where's your Messiah now you backstabbing
pieces
> of slag!  This'll teach you to double cross me!" Serpentor yelled, firing
an
> optic blast off at the Predacon base.
>
> =========
>
> Beachcomber gently pushed Smokescreen off of him.  Getting to his feet
with a
> limp, he looked at his arm and yelped.  It was what the humans would call:
"a
> dislocated shoulder".  Or, at least a dislocated right shoulder.  "Slag!"
> Smokescreen yelled.  "Hey...lady!" he yelled to Fidget.  "Give me a hand
with
> this guy.  I...can't use one of mine." he said, smiling slightly, gripping
> Smokescreen by the head, his palm gripping on the back of the fellow
> Maximal's head.
>
> ---
>
> Ramhorn shook his head, waking up.  He had fallen asleep.  Slag waiting
for
> Plintissa!  Everything was going the Inferno!  The base was dead.  It
might
> be better just to sell it and buy a new one!  Of course...that was
> impossible...it wouldn't be a bad idea if that ship's destruction wouldn't

> lead to the eventual destruction of Cybertron itself!
> "Ramhorn...beast...mode." going to rhino mode, Ramhorn slowly (and I mean
> slowly) headed for the Ark.
>
